description: The notification will be generated whenever a Net-Net Central Server is
determined to be unreachable by another the Net-Net Central server configured in the same cluster.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerUnreachable APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressRemote s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameRemote s EXAMPLE

description: The address of the local Net-Net Central server in the cluster.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal

description: The name (if available) of the local Net-Net Central server in the cluster.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal

description: The address of a Net-Net Central server, whose reachability status has changed.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressRemote

description: The name of a Net-Net Central server (if available), whose
reachability status has changed and detected by a peer local NNC server.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameRemote

description: The notification will be generated whenever a previously
unreachable Net-Net Central Server is determined to be reachable
by another Net-Net Central server configured in the same cluster.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerUnreachableClear APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressRemote s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameRemote s EXAMPLE

variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressRemote

description: The name of a Net-Net Central server (if available), whose
reachability status has changed and detected by a peer local NNC server.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameRemote

description: The notification will be generated when the main Net-Net Central Server has determined that the trap relay process is not alive during the Server start up process

Summary.eval: ($v3 ne '') ? 'Trap relay process not operational due to $v3' : 'Trap relay process not operational during server startup'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APNNC-MIB::apNNCTrapRelayNotAliveNotification APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCFailureReason s EXAMPLE

variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal

variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal

description: The reason for failure.
variables.name: APNNC-MIB::apNNCFailureReason

description: The notification will be generated when the main Net-Net Central Server has determined that the trap relay process is alive during Server start up process

event.Summary: Trap Relay process operational during server startup

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APNNC-MIB::apNNCTrapRelayAliveNotification APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal s EXAMPLE

description: THIS TRAP IS BEING DEPRECATED IN FAVOR of A NEW TRAP apNNCReportingHdrAggregationLagFailure.
The notification will be generated when a
Net-Net Central Reporting HDR aggregation task fails
to keep up with incoming HDR data.

Summary.eval: ($v3 ne '') ? 'Net-Net central reporting HDR aggregation failed due to $v3' : 'Net-Net central reporting HDR aggregation task failed'

description: THIS OBJECT IS BEING DEPRECATED IN FAVOR OF MORE ACCURATE OBJECT apNNCAggregationLagPercent.
The percent of time lag of the local Net-Net Central server, which is lagging behing
in the process of aggrgation of HDR data in the cluster.

description: THIS TRAP IS BEING DEPRECATED IN FAVOR of A NEW TRAP apNNCReportingHdrAggregationLagFailureClear.
The notification will be generated when a
previosly failed Net-Net Central Reporting HDR aggregation task
is now able to keep up with incoming HDR data.

event.Summary: Net-Net central reporting HDR aggregation failure resolved

description: The notification will be generated when a
Net-Net Central Reporting user's password is near
to expiry date.

event.Summary: Net-Net central reporting user $v1 password expires on $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APNNC-MIB::apNNCReportingPswdExpiration APNNC-MIB::apNNCReportingUser s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCReportingPswdExpiryDate s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerAddressLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCServerNameLocal s EXAMPLE APNNC-MIB::apNNCFailureReason s EXAMPLE
